item.description:
We will call in our Angelic Guides and release all that no longer serves us,
or hinders our life experience, replacing it with golden-white, healing Light.

Master Intuitive Susan Sloane will relay messages from your guides and facilitate the healing process.

Susan has been holding these group healing events for 2 years now, and they are powerful. You will drop baggage & have an experience to remember.

Pre-registration preferred - $20 in advance - $25 at the door.

You can pre-pay here: http://schedule.etern...

Master Intuitive Susan Sloane walks with a foot in both worlds. She has the extraordinary ability to pinpoint the primal cause of illness, blocks, and imbalances and pull them right out of your energy field on the spot. A lifelong clairvoyant, Susan communicates with your Angelic guides, relaying important information to assist you on your path. With her powerful connection to Spirit, love, and compassion, she brings you to a place of clarity, peace, and well-being.

Ms. Sloane is a writer, gifted healer, and spiritual counselor with a private practice specializing in personal and call-in sessions. She frequently leads classes and workshops on self healing, activating the Lightbody, and the ascension process. She is the hostess of State of the Heart on blogtalkradio.com, and will soon publish her first book.
item.name: Shamanic Healing Circle
